title: Chapter VI - Minimum Standards And Regulations For Management Of State Correctional Facilities
content:
Chapter VI - Minimum Standards And Regulations For Management Of State Correctional Facilities

State Regulations

Part 7600 - Legal Authority (§ 7600.1)

Part 7601 - Definitions (§ 7601.1)

Part 7602 - Environmental Health And Safety (§ 7602.1 to 7602.9)

Part 7603 - Variances (§ 7603.1 to 7603.5)

Part 7605 - Policies And Procedures (§ 7605.1 to 7605.6)

Part 7612 - Prisoner Personal Hygiene (§ 7612.1 to 7612.9)

Part 7621 - Maximum Facility Capacity (§ 7621.1 to 7621.11)

Part 7633 - Sanitation (§ 7633.1 to 7633.7)

Part 7634 - Chemical Agents (§ 7634.1 to 7634.8)

Part 7640 - Use of body imaging scanning equipment (§ 7640.1 to 7640.5)

Part 7651 - Health Services (§ 7651.1 to 7651.33)

Part 7654 - Repealed

Part 7677 - Academic Education (§ 7677.1 to 7677.12)

Part 7679 - Library Services (§ 7679.1 to 7679.7)

Part 7695 - Nondiscriminatory Treatment (§ 7695.1 to 7695.5)

Part 7700 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
